cell.color: Fencing that reflects the endangered species theme is best incorporated into exhibits for endangered animals, such as Przewalski's wild horse or the scimitar horned oryx. You can also use endangered species fencing to create attractive themed public areas near your animal exhibits.
Conservation fences are used to enclose special protected conservation areas. Conservation fences cannot be sold or recycled.

The endangered species window fence combines the security of a high fence with an unobstructed guest view. Fencing that reflects the endangered species theme is best incorporated into exhibits for endangered species, such as Przewalski's wild horse or the scimitar horned oryx.
Vehicle gates allow ground vehicles to enter and exit animal exhibits. To prevent animal escapes, this mechanized gate closes automatically after the vehicle has passed by.

Vehicle gates allow ground vehicles to enter and exit animal exhibits. To prevent animal escapes, this mechanized gate closes automatically after the vehicle has passed by.
You must complete the Transportation campaign to unlock the decorated vehicle gate.

Wrought iron is a sturdy material that can be formed into graceful, decorative shapes. The wrought iron fence is both attractive and effective at containing strong animals that might bash through weaker fences. The wrought iron fence also allows your guests a clear view of your animals.
